fullDescription.intro: Supports the IndigoMolecule and IndigoQueryMolecule inputs. This node combines the input molecule components into joined molecules and writes the result molecules into the output table column. Defines the output column type automatically.
fullDescription.option: Filter for choosing the component columns
Column name for the output molecules

ports.inPort: Table containing Indigo molecules or query molecules
ports.outPort: The same as input, plus the column with the combined components
